testcase.name: Select title MR from dropdown
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the quote page.........................................passed When the dropdown is selected...............................................passed Then user can select the title MR...........................................passed

testcase.name: A invalid email address is entered
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the quote page.........................................passed When an invalid email address "qwer1234" is entered.........................passed Then an error is displayed..................................................passed

testcase.name: A valid email address is entered
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the quote page.........................................passed When a valid email address is "qwer1234" entered............................passed Then no error is displayed..................................................passed

testcase.name: Postcode lookup for valid postcode
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the quote page.........................................passed When they complete the Your Details Section and enter a valid postcode and clicks find address.passed Then a list of addresses is shown...........................................passed

testcase.name: Quote form completed
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the quote page.........................................passed When they complete all sections with valid information and click continue...passed Then the summary page is displayed..........................................passed
